headline: Ocasio-Cortez Criticizes Cuomo’s Plan for a Rail Link to La Guardia
abstract: The Queens representative Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez demanded to know why all 46 alternatives to Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s $2 billion AirTrain were ruled out so quickly.
lead_paragraph: For Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, who has made building major projects a centerpiece of his tenure, it is a signature plan — turning La Guardia Airport into a world-class, 21st-century travel hub.
keywords: Port Authority of New York and New Jersey
